The joint account where salary is credited only earns base interest.  I am looking for a joint account which is multipler and will earn higher than base interest upon salary creditHC Tang15 May 2019Not that I know off at the moment. Easiest and closest way is that you could turn one of the two DBS multiplier as joint and save combine funds there and leave the join account as it is. Once it hits the cap for high interest, move the excess funds to the join account or other liquid Investment instrument.
